imgfmt.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #if !defined( STCI_H )
00002 
00003 #define STCI_H
00004 
00005 // Sir-Tech's Crazy Image (STCI) file format specifications.  Each file is composed of:
00006 // 1        ImageFileHeader, uncompressed
00007 // *        Palette (STCI_INDEXED, size = uiNumberOfColours * PALETTE_ELEMENT_SIZE), uncompressed
00008 // *        SubRectInfo's (usNumberOfRects > 0, size = usNumberOfSubRects * sizeof(SubRectInfo) ), uncompressed
00009 // *        Bytes of image data, possibly compressed
00010 
00011 #include "Types.h"
00012 
00013 #define STCI_ID_STRING       "STCI"
00014 #define STCI_ID_LEN          4
00015 
00016 #define STCI_ETRLE_COMPRESSED       0x0020
00017 #define STCI_ZLIB_COMPRESSED        0x0010
00018 #define STCI_INDEXED                                  0x0008
00019 #define STCI_RGB                                            0x0004
00020 #define STCI_ALPHA                                          0x0002
00021 #define STCI_TRANSPARENT                        0x0001
00022 
00023 // ETRLE defines
00024 #define COMPRESS_TRANSPARENT                    0x80
00025 #define COMPRESS_NON_TRANSPARENT                0x00
00026 #define COMPRESS_RUN_LIMIT                            0x7F
00027 
00028 // NB if you're going to change the header definition:
00029 // - make sure that everything in this header is nicely aligned
00030 // - don't exceed the 64-byte maximum
00031 typedef struct
00032 {
00033       UINT8       cID[STCI_ID_LEN];
00034       UINT32      uiOriginalSize;
00035       UINT32      uiStoredSize; // equal to uiOriginalSize if data uncompressed
00036       UINT32      uiTransparentValue;
00037       UINT32      fFlags;
00038       UINT16      usHeight;
00039       UINT16      usWidth;
00040       union
00041       {
00042             struct
00043             {
00044                   UINT32      uiRedMask;
00045                   UINT32      uiGreenMask;
00046                   UINT32      uiBlueMask;
00047                   UINT32      uiAlphaMask;
00048                   UINT8       ubRedDepth;
00049                   UINT8       ubGreenDepth;
00050                   UINT8       ubBlueDepth;
00051                   UINT8       ubAlphaDepth;
00052             } RGB;
00053             struct
00054             { // For indexed files, the palette will contain 3 separate bytes for red, green, and blue
00055                   UINT32      uiNumberOfColours;
00056                   UINT16      usNumberOfSubImages;
00057                   UINT8       ubRedDepth;
00058                   UINT8       ubGreenDepth;
00059                   UINT8       ubBlueDepth;
00060                   UINT8       cIndexedUnused[11];
00061             } Indexed;
00062       };
00063       UINT8       ubDepth;    // size in bits of one pixel as stored in the file
00064       UINT32      uiAppDataSize;
00065       UINT8       cUnused[15];
00066 } STCIHeader;
00067 
00068 #define STCI_HEADER_SIZE 64
00069 
00070 typedef struct
00071 {
00072       UINT32                  uiDataOffset;
00073       UINT32                  uiDataLength;
00074       INT16                   sOffsetX;
00075       INT16                   sOffsetY;
00076       UINT16                  usHeight;
00077       UINT16                  usWidth;
00078 } STCISubImage;
00079 
00080 #define STCI_SUBIMAGE_SIZE 16
00081 
00082 typedef struct
00083 {
00084       UINT8                   ubRed;
00085       UINT8                   ubGreen;
00086       UINT8                   ubBlue;
00087 } STCIPaletteElement;
00088 
00089 #define STCI_PALETTE_ELEMENT_SIZE 3
00090 #define STCI_8BIT_PALETTE_SIZE 768
00091 
00092 #endif
